messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Now retired, I was born in Stepney and went to school in Whitechapel and ran my own business in Bow. I joined UKIP because I care about our community. We need change! My aims are to address overcrowding in social housing, the bedroom tax, ex-council house leaseholders, jobs, social services for physical and mental health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aim to address overcrowding in social housing.
Aim to address the issues related to the bedroom tax.
Aim to support ex-council house leaseholders.
Aim to improve jobs and opportunities.
Aim to provide better social services for physical and mental health.

mentions.candidate: I will work tirelessly to make a difference and to help our area to be a better place to live & work.

issues.health: Better social services for physical and mental health.
issues.socialWelfare: Addressing overcrowding in social housing, the bedroom tax, and support for less fortunate members of the community.

housing.content: Aims to address overcrowding in social housing and issues for ex-council house leaseholders.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you want change then please lend me your vote.
